name: Banana Boy
description: I'm a part time super hero. I dont have any special powers or skills but I get 100% for effort.

name: Bingo Beaver
description: I have alot of stories to tell, come and sit by me and I'll tell you tales from the olden days that you would never believe.

name: keith the blood sucking vampire
description:
well actually i prefer quorn to human flesh but don't tell anyone !

Keith will be medium (30cm)

Remember people, every Bobby Dazzler is different so you will be ordering one of his relatives who wont look exactly the same but will be a vampire.

Because all dolls are made to order they take a bit of time. All orders will be with you within three weeks (please add another week for overseas.) If you have an earlier deadline send us an email and we'll let you know if we can reach it. 

All orders will be sent recorded delivery, if you are ordering from overseas please pay shipping charge. 

All Bobby Dazzlers are handmade in London by Rosie and Fumie

name: Wrapping paper mix up !
description:
Our two wrapping papers in one bumper roll. 

This wrap makes any present look good.

all designed and drawn by us and printed in the UK.

5 anytime doodle sheets and 5 christmas special sheets

stock up now !!!

500mm by 700mm, 80gsm, silk finish.

name: Any time wrapping paper (5 sheets)
description:
Its back our old favorite doodle wrap ! One day on the Bobby Dazzler boat we started drawing and we couldnt stop ! this is the end result.

Always something new to see , use as wrapping paper or a poster

5 sheets, 500mm by 700mm, 80gsm, silk finish.

name: Christmas Wrap (5 sheets)
description:
This is the lovely Bobby Dazzler Christmas wrapping paper and we are doing  free post in uk on it till Christmas, who could resist !This is a roll of 5 sheets and make any gifts look extra good. 

Imagine how good it will look under the tree !

500mm by 700mm, 80gsm, silk finish.

name: Seb 'C'mon sit next to me' cushion
description:
Ello me old heartys, I've seen some things at sea I can tell you. I've partied with mermaids and rode on the backs on blue whales. Nowadays I have a slower pace, some call me a coach potato. 

Our new cushions all screen printed and made in the uk and hand finished by us with different buttons for eyes. 

Each is individual. with a lovely feather inner. 

The button on Sebs eye will be different on each cushion. 

They are 43cm by 43cm

name: Rex 'Lets have a break' cushion
description:
I'm Rex I'll do anything to make you comfortable. I mainly like sitting on the sofa watching TV and playing snooker.

Our new cushions all screen printed and made in the uk and hand finished by us with different buttons for eyes. 

Each is individual. with a lovely feather inner. 

Rex's face is slightly darker grey than in the picture and the button on his eye will be different. 

They are 43cm by 43cm
